name: XP Racing
description:
XP Racing is a love letter to the classic racing games from the NES era!

We wanted to use pixel-art in a way that is faithful to the 90's console limitations, only breaking those rules sparsely to enhance the player's experience and customization.

Play Modes:

■ Tournament: Win 4 gold trophies in a row!
■ Time Trial: Beat all the time records!

Features:

■ 4 tracks
■ Simple controls
■ 4 free cars and paint jobs
■ 6 premium cars and paint jobs
